snippet.title: Kamen Rider: Battride War - Official Japanese Reveal Trailer - HD
snippet.description:
Kamen Rider: Battride War (仮面ライダー　バトライド・ウォー Kamen Raidā Batoraido Wō?) is an upcoming video game based on the Kamen Rider Series slated to be released on May 23, 2013. Done in the style of Dynasty Warriors, the player controls one of the Kamen Riders as he battles through a series of enemies. The game mainly features the protagonists of the Heisei era of Kamen Rider, starting with 2000's Kamen Rider Kuuga and featuring up to 2013's Kamen Rider Wizard. A limited edition of the game will be released that allows the player to modify the soundtrack by using original songs from the series.

The game's story mode known as "Chronicle Mode" ultimately pits the Kamen Riders against their mortal enemies in a final showdown.

The Kamen Rider Girls will provide an original song for the game titled "Go get 'em".
